OrgName: Issues Management, Inc., DBA Lawrence & Schiller TeleServices
activities: Lawrence & Schiller (L&S) may receive phone calls from employees of companies that have locations in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.  These employees may provide confidential information to an employee of L&S.  It is the expectation of that employee to keep all information confidential and to only share that information with the company that contracted L&S to take phone calls.  The confidential information received by the L&S employee will be saved into a CRM provided by client.  At no time is this information shared with any other 3rd party.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Issues Management has an internal privacy program to train team members on the principles of Safe Harbor.
